resources.string:
I. Main Menu - Icon Sources: 
1. https://www.pngaaa.com/detail/490986 
2. https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/children_3886660 
3. https://www.pinclipart.com/pindetail/oxiwxw_this-is-an-image-of-a-clipboard-report/ 
4. https://www.pngaaa.com/detail/2802581 
5. https://www.pngaaa.com/detail/473824 
6. Layout Inspiration: https://youtu.be/LOcD1evBcSA 

	II. Coin Flip Activity: 
1. Custom Spinner Tutorial: https://youtu.be/GeO5F0nnzAw 
2. Coin flip GIF: https://i.pinimg.com/originals/cc/47/83/cc4783a977efbb9cd2a74d6761d7d8d3.gif 

	III. Timeout Timer Activity: 
1. The countdown timer: https://youtu.be/MDuGwI6P-X8 
2. Timer Running in background: https://youtu.be/lvibl8YJfGo 
3. Send notification when timer done: https://www.tutorialspoint.com/how-to-create-android-notification-with-broadcastreceiver 
4. Customize minutes: https://youtu.be/7dQJAkjNEjM 
5. Adding sound and vibration: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/31398381/how-to-add-custom-notification-sound-in-android 
6. All images used in timer part: 
https://www.clipartmax.com/middle/m2i8K9m2b1G6K9m2_calm-clip-art/ 
https://www.clipartmax.com/middle/m2i8N4b1m2N4d3Z5_when-the-district-operates-under-a-90-minute-delay-alarm-clock-clip/ 
https://tinyurl.com/timeIsUpImage
